title: Un type comme moi ne devrait jamais mourir = A Guy Like Me Should Never Die
description: Leopold is an investment broker who is so opposed to war that he transfers his entire personal portfolio into chocolates, reasoning that this is a product that can never be turned to war-like use. One day, Leopold feels the need to break his old routine and leaves wife and career behind in order to meditate on the meaning of life.  Credits: Producer, Bernard Lenteric ; director, Michel Vianey ; writer, Michel Vianey ; photography, Georges Barsky ; music, Mort Schuman. Cast: Jean-Michel Folon, Francine Racette, Bernard Fresson, Mort Schuman, Henri Garcin, Pierre Barouh, Bernadette Lafont.
